subject: Re: [junit] Any idea about webservice unit testing
msgSnippet: ... It is possible to test anything with a Java interface using JUnit. As for a better tool, can you tell us what you don t like about testing web services
messageBody:
Ashish Kadam wrote:

> Hey Guys
> Does anyone know of a better tool for testing
> webservice or even if it is possible to do tat using
> junit or cactus?

It is possible to test anything with a Java interface using JUnit.

As for a "better tool," can you tell us what you don't like about
testing web services with JUnit? Are you testing a web service provider
or client? What problems have you encountered so far?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
